An error occurred while exporting your data. This is probably a bug in the FieldWorks code. Details: {0}
Ralat terjadi sambil ekspor (mengeluarkan) data Anda. Hal ini terjadi mungkin karena masalah dengan program FieldWorks. Informasi: {0}
An error occurred while exporting your data. This could be the result of an error in an FXT file, an output file that is locked, or a bug in the FieldWorks code.

Ralat terjadi sambil ekspor (mengeluarkan) data Anda. Hal ini terjadi mungkin karena ada ralat di dalam berkas FXT, berkas yang dipakai untuk ekspor dikunci, atau ada masalah dengan program FieldWorks.
An internal error has occurred. To help us fix the problem, please submit this error information to us.
Ralat ditemui di dalam program FieldWorks. To help us fix the problem, please submit this error information to us.
Analysis languages are the languages for notes, back translations, glosses, definitions, analyses, etc. Select, or define, a default analysis language writing system.
Bahasa analisa adalah bahasa untuk catatan, terjemahan balik, arti singkat, definisi, analisa, dll. Pilih, atau arasi, sistem tulisan bahasa analisa sebagai asali.

Another instance of FieldWorks appears to be running, but did not respond properly to a request from this one. This is a bug; please report it to FlexErrors@sil.org. We recommend that you shut down all FieldWorks applications and try again. If you still get this message, restart your computer. (Experts may also try to recover by killing any FieldWorks processes using TaskManager.) Do you want to Retry now?

Contoh FieldWorks lain tampaknya sedang berjalan, namun tidak menanggapi permintaan dari sini dengan baik. Terjadi masalah; harap melapor ke FlexErrors@sil.org. Kami menyarankan Anda mematikan program FieldWorks dan mencoba kembali. Jika Anda masih mendapatkan pesan ini, hidupkan ulang komputer Anda. (Para ahli juga dapat mencoba memulihkannya dengan mematikan setiap proses FieldWorks dengan TaskManager.) Coba lagi sekarang?

Another instance of FieldWorks appears to be starting up at the same time as this one, and things have gotten confused. We recommend letting one project open fully before you try to open another one. If you get this message repeatedly or when not trying to open two projects at once, you may have encountered a bug; please report it. It may help to restart your computer.

Contoh FieldWorks lain tampaknya mulai di saat yang bersamaan dengan ini, dan terjadi kebingungan. Kami menyarankan membiarkan satu proyek terbuka sepenuhnya sebelum membuka yang lain. Jika Anda mendapatkan pesan ini berulang kali atau ketika tidak mencoba membuka dua proyek di saat yang bersamaan, mungkin terjadi masalah; laporkan segera. Menghidupkan ulang komputer Anda mungkin membantu.

Choose a grammatical category (Part of Speech) from the following Catalog. The category you choose will be added to the list of categories for this FieldWorks Project.

Choose a new inflection feature from the following Catalog. The inflection feature you choose will be added to the list of Inflection features for this FieldWorks Project.

Choose one or more new phonological features from the following Catalog. Note that all features are binary (i.e. have two values: + and -). The phonological features you choose will be added to the list of phonological features for this FieldWorks Project.

Pilih satu atau lebih ciri-ciri fonologi baru dari katalog berikut. Perhatikan bahwa semua ciri-ciri adalah biner (yaitu memiliki dua nilai: + dan -). Ciri-ciri fonologi yang anda pilih akan ditambahkan ke daftar ciri-ciri fonologi untuk proyek FieldWorks ini.

FieldWorks cannot complete saving some changes to the character data because at least one file ({0}) is in use by another FieldWorks program. Please stop all FieldWorks programs other than your current program, then click "Retry" to try again.

FieldWorks tidak dapat selesai menyimpan perubahan data karakter karena setidaknya satu berkas ({0}) sedang digunakan oleh program FieldWorks lain. Hentikan seluruh program FieldWorks selain program saat ini, lalu klik "Coba Lagi" untuk mencoba lagi.

FieldWorks cannot open the project {0} because another program is using it. Please close the other program and try again. Note: this can sometimes occur when there appears to be no other program using the file. The simplest way to fix this is to log off and on again. Other options are discussed in Help.

FieldWorks tidak dapat membuka proyek {0} karena program lain sedang menggunakannya. Tutup program lain dan coba lagi. Catatan: Hal ini terkadang dapat terjadi ketika tampaknya tak ada program lain menggunakan berkas ini. Cara termudah untuk memperbaiki hal ini adalah dengan log off dan on lagi. Pilihan lain dibahas di Bantu.
FieldWorks cannot restore the linked files to their original location. The restored linked files for this project will be placed inside the project folder.
FieldWorks tidak dapat mengembalikan berkas tersambung ke lokasi asal. Berkas tersambung yang telah dikembalikan untuk proyek ini akan diletakkan di dalam folder proyek.
FieldWorks cannot safely save your changes, because another program has modified the file. Expected write time {0} but found {1}.
FieldWorks tidak dapat dengan selamat menyimpan perubahan Anda, karena program lain telah memodifikasi berkas tersebut. Penulisan waktu yang diharapkan {0} tetapi ditemukan {1}.
FieldWorks cannot save your changes to {0}. It may be marked Read-only, or you may not have permission to write to the output directory. The file system reports {1}

FieldWorks cannot save your changes, because it does not have permission to replace the file {0}. It may be marked Read-only, or you may not have permission to write in the folder. The file system reports {1}

FieldWorks has detected that an unknown field (possibly a custom field you have just deleted) is being used to filter or sort this view. Filtering and sorting will be disabled until you select a new filter or sort sequence.

FieldWorks mendeteksi sebuah bidang tak dikenal (kemungkinan sebuah bidang tambahan yang baru dihapus) sedang dipakai untuk menyaring atau mengurutkan tampilan ini. Penyaringan dan pengurutan akan dinonaktifkan sampai Anda memilih rangkaian penyaringan atau pengurutan baru.
FieldWorks is unable to move the following projects to the new location.
FieldWorks tidak dapat memindahkan proyek berikut ke lokasi baru.

FieldWorks needs to install some extra information for the character data which is being used for the first time. Just while this is being done, other FieldWorks programs need to be closed because at least one file ({0}) is in use by another FieldWorks program. Please stop all FieldWorks programs other than your current program, then click "Retry" to try again.

FieldWorks perlu menginstal beberapa informasi tambahan untuk data karakter yang dipakai untuk pertama kali. Sementara ini dilakukan, program FieldWorks lain perlu ditutup karena setidaknya satu berkas ({0}) sedang dipakai program FieldWorks lain. Hentikan seluruh program FieldWorks selain program yang Anda pakai saat ini, kemudian klik "Coba Lagi" untuk mencoba lagi.

FieldWorks needs to know which standard format marker(s) begin a group of related fields. Select at least one marker for each group. By selecting more than one marker, a new group will be started for any of these markers that have already occurred in the current group. A checked marker can only occur once in a given group. Click Help for examples.

FieldWorks perlu mengetahui penanda(-penanda) standar format yang mengawali kelompok bidang-bidang terkait. Pilih sekurangnya satu penanda untuk tiap kelompok. Dengan memilih lebih dari satu penanda, kelompok baru akan dimulai untuk tiap penanda-penanda yang muncul dalam kelompok saat ini. Penanda centang hanya dapat muncul sekali dalam kelompok tertentu. Klik Bantuan untuk contoh-contoh.

FieldWorks needs to restore some character data. Just while this is being done, other FieldWorks programs need to be closed because at least one file ({0}) is in use by another FieldWorks program. Please stop all FieldWorks programs other than your current program, then click "Retry" to try again.

FieldWorks perlu mengembalikan beberapa data karakter. Sementara ini dilakukan, program FieldWorks lain perlu ditutup karena setidaknya satu berkas ({0}) sedang dipakai program FieldWorks lain. FieldWorks was unable to convert the project {0} because it was created by a more recent version of FieldWorks. To convert this project, install the appropriate version of FieldWorks, and turn sharing off then on again. (Note that doing this will upgrade all your projects to the newer version.)

FieldWorks tidak dapat mengubah proyek {0} karena itu dibuat oleh FieldWorks versi lebih baru. Untuk mengubah proyek ini, instal FieldWorks versi yang sesuai, dan matikan berbagi dan nyalakan kembali. (Perhatikan melakukan hal ini akan mengubah seluruh proyek Anda ke versi lebih baru).

FieldWorks was unable to convert the project {0}. This is generally a bug in the program. We recommend that you restart the program as soon as you can. If possible, please zip the entire contents of the folder {1} and send it to Flex_Errors@sil.org with the message "{2}" and any other information you think may help. FieldWorks will continue and try to convert other projects.

FieldWorks tidak dapat mengubah proyek {0}. Ini pada umumnya merupakan masalah di program. Kami merekomendasikan Anda menghidupkan ulang program segera. Bila memungkinkan, zip seluruh konten folder {1} dan kirimkan ke Flex_Errors@sil.org dengan pesan "{2}" dan informasi lain yang Anda pikir dapat membantu. FieldWorks akan melanjutkan dan mencoba mengubah proyek lain.

FLEx was not able to do the initial import. FLEx Bridge will protect its shared LIFT data from loss by requiring a retry of the initial import, until it is successful. Retry attempts will start with the next LIFT Send/Receive attempt. Sorry for the inconvenience, but a new version of FLEx will likely be required in order to continue using LIFT Send/Receive.

FLex tidak dapat melakukan impor awal. FLex Bridge akan melindungi data berbagi LIFT dari kehilangan dengan mengharuskan pencobaan lagi impor awal, hingga berhasil. Upaya coba lagi akan mulai dengan upaya Kirim/Terima LIFT berikutnya. Maaf atas ketidaknyamanan ini, tetapi FLex versi baru akan diharuskan untuk melanjutkan menggunakan Kirim/Terima LIFT.

FLEx was not able to import the changes received. FLEx Bridge will protect its shared LIFT data from loss by requiring a retry of the import, until it is successful. Retry attempts will start with the next LIFT Send/Receive attempt. Sorry for the inconvenience, but a new version of FLEx will likely be required in order to continue using LIFT Send/Receive.

In this step, FieldWorks will do a trial run of interpreting the dictionary you are importing using the mapping you have set up. It will produce a "readiness report" (which is currently rather scary) telling you what it found.
If the results are not satisfactory, you can press "Back" and modify some settings. You may also need to edit the file you are importing. Then proceed back to this screen and generate a new readiness report.
When you are satisfied and ready to proceed with the import, click "Next".

Jika hasilnya tidak memuaskan, anda dapat tekan "Kembali" dan ubah beberapa setelan. Anda mungkin juga perlu mengedit berkas yang anda impor. Kemudian lanjutkan kembali ke layar ini dan buat laporan kesediaan baru.

Merge Duplicate Analyses deletes all but one of the merged analyses. If other copies of this project are in use, and the deleted analyses are subsequently used in those copies to analyze texts, those confirmed analyses will be reset to defaults when that copy of the project is brought up to date with this one. Ideally, all users of the project should Send/Receive right before and again right after using this command, with the system where the command is done being the last to S/R before doing it and the first afterwards. If this is not possible, try to avoid analyzing texts in other copies of the project until a Send/Receive has been done.

Gabung Analisa Duplikat menghapus semua tetapi satu dari analisa gabungan. Bila salinan lain dari proyek ini sedang digunakan, dan analisa yg dihapus digunakan selanjutnya di salinan tersebut untuk menganalisa teks, analisa yang telah dikonfirmasi akan kembali ke asal ketika salinan proyek digunakan bersama dengan ini. Idealnya, semua pemakai proyek sebaikanya Kirim/Terima tepat sebelumnya dan sesudah menggunakan perintah ini, dengan sistem di mana perintah tersebut menjadi akhir bagi K/T sebelum melakukannya dan pertama setelahnya. Bila ini tidak memungkinkan, cobalah hindari menganalisa teks di salinan lain proyek ini sampai Kirim/Terima telah selesai.
